Title: Cross-Site Scripting
Description: Failing to properly encode user input, the page module is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting. A valid backend user account with permissions to edit plugins is needed to exploit this vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 6.2.27, all versions starting from 7.0.0.alpha before 7.6.11, all versions starting from 8.0.0.alpha before 8.3.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 6.2.27 before 7.0.0.alpha, all versions starting from 7.6.11 before 8.0.0.alpha, all versions starting from 8.3.1
